Asteroid designations ( Number, Name, Temporary designation): 99942, Apophis, 2004_MN4
Observation was done on (UT) (format YYYY-MM-DD-hh): 2005 - 01 - 08 - 06:01
Observation was made by : Binzel E-mail; rpb@mit.edu
At observatory with UAI code: 568
The spectrum was published in the article: http://adsabs.harvard.edu/abs/2009Icar..200..480B
Obsv. comments:
The normalization of this spectrum was made for the wavelength: 1.250 microns.
Old name of the file was: Apophis.txt
